strings.evolution:
I am used to having my work questioned,
but I promise I will not betray you.
Shall I swear with my sword?
strings.affinity:
Do exactly as I taught you!
You can fly!
strings.description: A sky pirate who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. Balthier made quite a name for himself soaring the skies and stealing from the wicked with his partner Fran, a viera warrior. However, fate lead him to join Princess Ashe's efforts in restoring her country of Dalmasca after its destruction at the hands of the Archadian Empire. This journey helped him to reconnect with his past and ultimately face off against his own father.
strings.fusion:
I, myself, am a runaway.
I believe I ran away so that I could be free.
strings.summon:
You want me to come with you?
Okay, as long as I get some
treasure out of it.

strings.affinity:
Do exactly as I taught you!
You can fly!
strings.description: A sky pirate who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. Balthier is a man who prizes his freedom above all else, endlessly globetrotting Ivalice on his airship, the Strahl, with his partner Fran. A man of many virtues, he nobly claims to steal only from the wicked, although his pompousness and philandering are unbecoming. Little did he know, however, that his plans to steal the treasures hidden within the Royal Palace of Rabanastre's treasury would change his life forever.
strings.fusion:
Enough with the sluggish piloting.
It is unbecoming of a hero.
strings.summon:
Who am I, you ask?
Isn't it obvious?
I'm the star of this show.
